Name: Rijsel
Review Text: This is proper! Very simple and classic dishes from quality produce made to perfection. Waiting staff very friendly and attentive (which is not that common in Amsterdam) â€¦

Review Text: Wonderful restaurant in the East of Amsterdam. Located in a old school, the restaurant has been designed to keep the same atmosphere and give you the feeling to be still in a school. â€¦

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: I just love this restaurant. Everything I have ever ordered here has been excellent. Their wine list is superb! I love the service here too, they are just so professional and lovely! One of the best places in Amsterdam.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Great Restaurant with professional and friendly stuff. Highly recommend the chicken and itâ€™s sauce.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Great place for chicken. Although the service was very attentive when we arrived, it dropped noticeably after dessert was served. Food was good but not extraordinary. Would recommend to try it out.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Oh man, the most amazing place. The atmosphere, the service and last but not least the foodâ€¦ I loved how Rijsel makes you feel like youâ€™re in a fancy Parisian restaurant, yet the vibe is still so relaxed and inviting. Five stars will definitely come back.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Fantastic food, but even better staff. Really enjoyed this unique take on food.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Lovely food, mediocre staff. Every question we asked they had to check. Still worth a visit

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Amazing food, friendly staff awesome kitchen !! Must visit when coming to Amsterdam

Name: Rijsel
Review Text:

Service is very good as well. Highly recommended!

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: awesome food. great staff

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: I was absolutely BLOWN away by the quality of the produce and the dishes served. Iâ€™ve been meaning to go to Rijsel for a while now after hearing only good things, but my expectations have been far exceeded. Incredible food but more â€¦

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: The food was excellent! Service was impeccable, very attentive. Overall, it was a very good meal!

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Very good food. The downside is you need to reserve weeks in advance

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: To all Amsterdam restaurants: THIS is how you should be doing SERVICE! the food was good but the service was beyond great. Tables are spaced enough that you can have a conversation without shouting. Decoration is on point. Dishes were tasty and portions well sized. Definitely coming back!

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Pricey option and recommended for special occasions. Has a fantastic wine collection. Good service. Their prime rib stake is not to tongue and eyes both.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: We visited Rijsel on a Saturday evening for their special â€˜sauerkrautâ€™ evening with meats of Brandt and Levie. Organic sausages and patÃ©s. We were welcomed with a handshake and warm welcome. Coats taken and a lovely quite table. The â€¦

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Very plain and simple. I know they say that's their whole idea, but then it's just overpriced and overhyped for what you get. A bit more room between the tables would also be nice, but I guess it's mostly about making as much money as â€¦

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: So good. Such good service. Such lovely people. The wine and food would be my last meal on death row.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: It was a great experience to have dinner in Rijsel. Everything was amazing, from bread and butter, the fish soup is delicious, cod is great, should really try the cod. EntrecÃ´te was the best dish of the night. Will come back for sure

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Awesome place, great food,  and really homey atmosphere

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: We were referred here by friend and Iâ€™m really glad we went. It was a Monday night and the place was packed. I almost didnâ€™t want to write a review for fear of upsetting the mostly-local vibe. â€¦

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Wonderful menu, amazing food. Very curious and helpful staff especially I  regard to navigating the extensive wine menu. Also the atmosphere and decor is quite cozy and warm. Looking forward to going back soon.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: What can I say about Rijsel, one of my favorite restaurants in Amsterdam. I mean you just canâ€™t fault it. The ambience, the food, the service and the wine. Just amazing. The feeling I get whenever I dine here makes me so happy and warm. It â€¦

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: We were looking forward to a lovely dinner in a nice setting. Alas, the food was mediocre at best and the service was rude. You can certainly do better in Amsterdam for much less money and far better hospitality.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: It's been two-ish days now since I dined at Rijsel, and I'm still in awe. The food was terrific and plated with care. The som's were very knowledgeable. I was waffling between a white for the halibut, and was told "I'll bring you something â€¦

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Great French inspired food.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: This is so good. One of the best in Amsterdam. Order the cote de boeuf and toast cannibale upfront.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: A modest yet outstanding restaurant where the unpretentious food is the hero. Itâ€™s perfect for a smart casual meal, the interiors homely, warm and inviting. It was one of the first restaurants I visited in Amsterdam and remains one of my absolute favourites.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: It's been two-ish days now since I dined at Rijsel, and I'm still in awe. The food was terrific and plated with care.The som's were very knowledgeable. I was waffling between a white for the halibut, and was told "I'll bring you something â€¦

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Loved it! The staff was very polite, the food delicious and the atmosphere the most authentic I have seen since moving to Amsterdam 2.5 years ago. Highly recommended!

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: One of the most authentic dining experiences I've found in Amsterdam. It's a typically French menu filled with classic mainly meat based dishes. This is the kind of place you come to sit till the early hours whilst enjoying multiple courses and at least one bottle of wine. Book in advance. Cool bathrooms too.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Very tasty food and the staff is really kind. There is not too much choice on the menu but the ones are diverse! So wether you are vegeterian, like fish or love meat, no problem there always something delightfull to pick!

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: My wife and I got the worst food poisoning of our lives from their Hanger Steak. My wife only had a bite and got sick. I was bedridden for a day and a half. Itâ€™s been three days and weâ€™re still not right...Delicious though!

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Bread, butter, wine, salami, and service were excellent. Mussels were very good but slightly salty. My main course brill fish was slightly overcooked but lobster sauce served with the brill was delicious.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: This place is slowly becoming my favorite in town. Very well prepared, tasty French food with a flemish twist, constant menu with changing day courses, excellent wines by the glass and friendly staff. Roast chicken is delicious.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Rotisserie spring chicken to die for! Great value set menu available (if you can still fit in desert after the starter and main then you are one hungry person). Excellent french cookery!

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: I love this place. We had a great evening there, with perfect wine, good food and very nice and professional staff. Time to go back soon!

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Oh my ! One of the best pieces of meat EVER. Thanks to my local colleagues, I was taken to this wine&meat restaurant, what a memory. Since then, I keep recommending it to all my French-meat-loving friends and so far, none were disappointed.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: One of the best restaurants in Amsterdam! Incredible setting, food, vibe. Service is always top notch and the wine suggestions are always correct.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Rijsel servers an excellent menu every time I have visited here. It always fully booked and make sure you reserve well in advance. Staff is friendly and helpful. I don't like the acoustics of the place so much, its very hollow which for me makes it hard to hear what the people I'm whith are talking about.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: I have been to this restaurant twice.  Once in 2014 and again a few days ago. It is by all means different.  Only open in the evening and not on weekends.  The atmosphere is great, the service professional, the food is perfect. It is an experience.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Wonderful experience, chicken was great, as well as all our other dishes, and we will not forget Stephanieâ€™s amazing hospitality. Definitely worth stopping by if in Amsterdam.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Great time, good food!

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Excellent, with brilliant suggestions on the wine pairing from the staff!

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Wanna visit France but can't take out any more vacation days, or are rightfully worried about the amount of tourists you'll have to face in Paris? Just come to Rijsel and enjoy some honest French country side cuisine. No need to buy those â€¦

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Taste over look. Prices are very good for what you're eating.

Review Text: I think we were the only Americans in the place; not surprising since a Dutchman had recommended It -- a Dutchman, I must add, who really loves food.  The decor is high school cafeteria modern, with the ambience of a brasserie.  Every seat â€¦

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Absolutely loved it!!! There is surprise from starter to dessert. Really highly recommend it even though it is not cheap.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Nice nice experience. Noisy place in a good way, amazing dishes (try the eel, it worth it). Advise that you book before coming.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Absolutely love them. Every course was excellent and their flavors have blown my mind away!

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: LOVED this restaurant! From the atmosphere to the service to the food itself, I thoroughly enjoyed our dinner here. Yum!

Name: Rijsel

Name: Rijsel

Review Text: The cote de boeuf is out of this world. It's the best piece of meat that I've had in many years. The appetizers are all great. The service is outstanding.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Food was good and in large amounts, add to that great service with excellent choices of wine suggestions from waiter. I definitely want to come back!

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: This is by far my best food experience in Amsterdam. Dynamic place, great food, the staff is the best I've seen in Amsterdam. Lively atmosphere, very cosy... And very reasonable priced.

Name: Rijsel
Review Text: Fantastic food and great staff. When you're looking for some French classics you've just found the perfect place!
